title: Brain Damage
actors: Rick Hearst,Jennifer Lowry,Gordon MacDonald,Theo Barnes,John Zacherle,Lucille Saint-Peter,Vicki Darnell,Joseph Gonzalez,Bradlee Rhodes,Michael Bishop,Beverly Bonner,Ari M. Roussimoff,Michael Rubenstein,Angel Figueroa,John Reichert,Don Henenlotter,Kenneth Packard,Artemis Pizarro,Kevin Van Hentenryck,Slam Wedgehouse,Daniel Frye,Jeff Calder
summary: A normal, average guy who lives in New York City becomes dependent on an evil, disembodied brain.
